mapper.select: select s.id, s.uuid, s.title, s.type, s.mark from selproblem s, selproblem_problemlist sp, problemlist_course pc where #{courseUuid} = pc.course_uuid and pc.problem_list_uuid = sp.problem_list_uuid and sp.problem_list_uuid like "%"#{problemListUuid}"%" and sp.selproblem_uuid = s.uuid and s.title like "%"#{search}"%"
mapper.delete: delete from selproblem_problemlist where problem_list_uuid = #{problemListUuid} and selproblem_uuid = #{selProblemUuid}
mapper.select: select * from selproblem_problemlist where #{selProblemUuid} = selproblem_uuid and #{problemListUuid} = problem_list_uuid
